resources.string: Please Go To Permissions Section and Allow All Required Permissions

Turn On Steady Mode to Enable this Functionality
Go to Settings to Turn Off Steady Mode
Shortcuts will create When Turn On Bluetooth
Select Main Color of Floating Shortcuts and Geeky Launcher.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

Please first Read Details then Modify this Features. Required Permissions Details & More
Enter the 6-digit code we sent you
Unable to confirm your phone number
Sorry, we are having trouble sending you a confirmation code.
This code has expired. Please resend confirmation code.
Please check your network and try again.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you are adding this email to your Digits account. You agree that this app and %7$sall apps listed in your Digits account%5$s can access this email address and their users can discover you by email.

By tapping %1$sSend confirmation code%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send you an SMS to confirm your phone number. On the next screen, you can choose “Resend code” to receive a new SMS or “Call me” to initiate a phone call to confirm your phone number. Message, call & data rates may apply.
By tapping %1$sCall me%1$s above, %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s will send you a voice call to confirm your phone number. Call & data rates may apply.

By tapping %1$sCreate account%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s, and %10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your phone number with %4$s, and that other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number.
By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, your %7$sDigits phone number and/or email address%5$s will be shared with %4$s and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.

By tapping %1$sContinue%1$s above, you agree to the %8$sTerms of Service%5$s, %9$sPrivacy Policy%5$s, and %10$sCookies Use%5$s of %6$sDigits by Twitter%5$s, to share your %7$sDigits phone number and/or email address%5$s with %4$s, and other users of %4$s can discover you by phone number and/or email.

Please check your email and try again
Please check your number and try again.
Unable to send this number an SMS message.

We use Digits by Twitter to find more of your friends who use this app. When you tap Okay, we\'ll upload your address book to Digits by Twitter so that we can help you find users of %1$s that you know or help other users of %1$s find you.
You have previously set a 2-step verification code on digits.com
Please Visit Geeks Empire Apps on Google Play Store
Say *OK Google! Open Floating Shortcuts* to Recover All Last Used Shortcuts.
GPS Automation Features will create Location Based Shortcuts Or When GPS Sensor Turn ON.\n It does NOT send Any GPS Info.
Shortcuts will create When Turn On GPS

Select an App to create Floating Shortcut & Widget. You can dragNdrop it around the display & Long Press to Remove it.

If You Like Shortcuts App Please Share it with Your Friends.\n Click Here To Open Shortcuts.
By This App you can Select an App to create *Floating Shortcut & Widget*.
Simple and Smooth Launcher Integrated to Shortcuts
Remove Shortcuts When WiFi|Bluetooth|GPS Turned OFF
Bind to Background Services & Enable All Remote Features

This is Essential Permission for Basic Functionality of Shortcuts App.

This Permission Allows to Add Floating Shortcuts View on Top of Other Apps.\n You Can Not Use Shortcuts App. Please Grant Permission.
This is Essential Permission for Basic Functionality of Shortcuts App. This Permission Allows to Add Floating Shortcuts View on Top of Other Apps.
"To Have More Floating Shortcuts, Widgets, Enable Automation Features & Preferences Please Purchase Shortcuts PRO."

\nGPS Or Storage Permission is denied. Shortcuts App needs these Permission for better functionality.

Please Grant Permission to Use these features & Pass this CheckPoint. Click Here to Open Shortcuts.
Remote & Smart Features need to Know How you Use Installed Apps.\n It does NOT collect Any Personal Info.
To Save some Configurations Shortcuts App needs to Write & Read Files. These Files Help to Optimise App Performance.
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
System Will Recover All Floating Shortcuts That Removed By System.

Allow %1$s to access the email address associated with your Twitter account \@%2$s so that %1$s can use it according to its privacy policy. For example, %1$s could send you updates and other information at that address.

Remote & Smart Features need to Know How you Use Installed Apps. For Example;\n Use OK Google! Command to Run Shortcuts. It Will Recreate last Shortcuts Automatically without Opening the App.

Please Grant Permission to Use these features & Pass this CheckPoint. Click Here to Open Shortcuts.
Please Be Patient. It is One-Time Setup

Please Be Patient! It is One-Time Setup.\n Since Android 6 System needs Users to Allow Or Deny Apps Required Permissions. You can Read about Required Permissions for Shortcuts App in Detail in Next Page & Click on each Item to Modify it.
Configure Floating Widgets for All Apps
